channel.title: Nikhil Pawar | Data Analytics Portfolio
channel.description: Professional data analytics portfolio showcasing structured analytical projects, dashboard development, and machine learning applications.

item.title: About
item.description: Data analytics professional with dual degrees in Information Systems from Pace University, New York. Specializing in SQL, Python, dashboard development, and KPI-driven performance analysis to support business decision-making.

item.title: Chatbot Development (LSTM)
item.description: Developed a deep learning-based chatbot using Python and LSTM neural networks. Implemented structured intent classification and response modeling to simulate real-world conversational AI systems.

item.title: COVID-19 Global Analysis
item.description: Built an interactive Tableau dashboard analyzing global COVID-19 deaths, vaccinations, and forecast projections. Processed 600K+ records using SQL and statistical tools to derive actionable insights.

item.title: IMDb Data Automation
item.description: Automated IMDb data extraction using Selenium WebDriver. Collected structured movie metadata including titles, ratings, reviews, and runtime for downstream analytical processing.

item.title: Recommendation System
item.description: Implemented a recommendation engine using Python to model user behavior and predict relevant content through collaborative filtering techniques.

item.title: Revenue Analysis
item.description: Conducted structured revenue analysis to evaluate income trends, profitability drivers, and performance metrics supporting data-driven business strategy.

item.title: Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Performed sentiment analysis on Twitter datasets using natural language processing techniques to evaluate brand perception and customer feedback trends.
